name: Thief Puzzle Master-Troll Game
description:
Play Thief Master Puzzle to explore the fun story of puzzle game. Brainstorm and challenge your creativity!

With this troll game, you may become a thief master and be ready to steal when you're interrupted by a slew of events: your girlfriend's father, her ex, your neighbor... Fortunately, you have the power to stretch your arm as far as you want in order to rob everything you want for. But be cautious with dangerous objects, do not touch them or you will pay the price.

GAME FEATURES:
- Easy to play but very fun
- Have fun with this difficult quiz and puzzle
- Completely free
- Excellent mental workout
- Amazing puzzle game for spare time
- Fun sound effects and eye-catching graphics
- Suitable for All Ages: The greatest trivia game for gatherings of family and friends!

HOW TO PLAY
- Drag to move and stretch your hand to steal everything
- Be careful with obstacles
- Use your smart and pass level

Are you ready to be the greatest tricky thief in new century?
-> Download Thief Master Puzzle: Troll Game now!
